question: Which of the following imposed a fine of 54 Crore rupees on Jet Airways, IndiGo, SpiceJet for unfair business practices?
explanation: The Competition Commission of India (CCI) imposed a fine of over Rs. 54 crore on Jet Airways, IndiGo, and SpiceJet over alleged cartelisation, unfair business practices with respect to fixing fuel surcharge on cargo transport. Jet Airways was fined Rs.39.81 crore while the penalties on IndiGo and SpiceJet are Rs.9.45 crore and Rs.5.1 crore, respectively.
